details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.4 Version and conformance level identification - PDF/A Identification Schema property conformance.
details.description: Property conformance of the PDF/A Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfaid

rule.description: Property conformance of the PDF/A Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfaid

error.message: Property conformance of the PDF/A Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1
